course_name: Introduction to Research in Chemistry, Biochemistry & Microbiology (A)
description: Students undertaking this course will have a unique opportunity to develop core research skills relevant to a wide spectrum of chemical or biological research, including written and oral communication, skills in making scientific observations, and recording and analysing data by participating in an individual or group research project associated with a discipline of interest to them.
prerequisites: #24 prior to enrolment and approval from School of Chemistry & Molecular Biosciences.
restricted: Students may count a maximum of #4 of project based courses to their degree (includes SCIE3012; BIOL3012;.SCIE3044 & BIOL3044).
